Healing

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Healing generally refers to the restoration of Hit points or Stamina, though sometimes Willpower is also targeted. This is accomplished through a variety of means, though the most common are rest and the Healer skill, though other methods such as Bard performances, the use of magic, and some items will also accomplish it.

The rate of healing accomplished is entirely dependent on the method used. The most effective, the healer skill, requires the subject be resting.

Healing Damage Implementation
